name: Kenny The Creep Dodger 2021
description:
Kenny is lost in the woods and suddenly gets hunted by creepy jellyfish like monsters, don't let them overcrowd him. What's your high score?

Enjoy!

=======

I made this game using a game developing guide by the Godot. This was a very good guide and you can check it out as well by following this link: https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/getting_started/step_by_step/your_first_g...
